verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> and <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread was <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>off;<s%> and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> to <S%G2902>seize<s%> Him by <S%G1388>stealth,<s%> and <S%G615>kill<s%> [Him;]
for they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Not <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G1859>festival,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> there be a <S%G2351>riot<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>"

And while He was in <S%G963>Bethany<s%> at the <S%G3614>home<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G3015>leper,<s%> and <S%G2621>reclining<s%> [at the table,] there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> with an <S%G211>alabaster<s%> <S%G211>vial<s%> of <S%G4185>very<s%> <S%G4185>costly<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> of <S%G4101>pure<s%> <S%G3487>nard;<s%> [and] she <S%G4937>broke<s%> the <S%G211>vial<s%> and <S%G2708>poured<s%> it <S%G2708>over<s%> His <S%G2776>head.<s%>

But <S%G5100>some<s%> were <S%G23>indignantly<s%> [remarking] to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G1519>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> has <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G684>wasted<s%>?

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G4097>sold<s%> for <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G5145>three<s%> <S%G5145>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii,<s%> and [the money] <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%>" And they were <S%G1690>scolding<s%> her.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> her <S%G863>alone;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2873>bother<s%> <S%G3930><s%> her? She has <S%G2038>done<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> to Me.

"For the <S%G4434>poor<s%> you <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> with you, and <S%G3752>whenever<s%> you <S%G2309>wish,<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> them <S%G2095>good;<s%> but you do not <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> Me.
"She has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> she <S%G2192>could;<s%> she has <S%G3462>anointed<s%> My <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G4301>beforehand<s%> for the <S%G1780>burial.<s%>

"And <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> is <S%G2784>preached<s%> in the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> that <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>woman<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> shall be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of in <S%G3422>memory<s%> of her."

And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>off<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him to them.

And they were <S%G5463>glad<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] and <S%G1861>promised<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G694>money.<s%> And he [began] <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him at an <S%G2122>opportune<s%> <S%G2122>time.<s%>

And on the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> [lamb] was being <S%G2380>sacrificed,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> do You <S%G2309>want<s%> us to <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> for You to <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%>?"

And He <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5217>"Go<s%> into the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and a <S%G444>man<s%> will <S%G528>meet<s%> you <S%G941>carrying<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him;

and <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> he <S%G1525>enters,<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3617>owner<s%> of the <S%G3617>house,<s%> 'The <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is My <S%G2646>guest<s%> <S%G2646>room<s%> in <S%G3699>which<s%> I may <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> with My <S%G3101>disciples<s%>?"'

" And he <S%G846>himself<s%> will <S%G1166>show<s%> you a <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G7012>upper<s%> <S%G7012>room<s%> <S%G4766>furnished<s%> [and] <S%G2092>ready;<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> for us <S%G1563>there.<s%>"

And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> [it] <S%G2531>just<s%> as He had <S%G3004>told<s%> them; and they <S%G2090>prepared<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
And when it was <S%G3798>evening<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> with the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>

And as they were <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table] and <S%G2068>eating,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G1520>one<s%> of you will <S%G3860>betray<s%> Me â€“ one who is <S%G2068>eating<s%> with Me."
They <S%G757>began<s%> to be <S%G3076>grieved<s%> and to <S%G3004>say<s%> to Him <S%G1520>one<s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G3385>"Surely<s%> not I?"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, ["It is] one of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> one who <S%G1686>dips<s%> with Me in the <S%G5165>bowl.<s%>

" For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> [is to] <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of Him; but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%> [It would have been] <S%G2570>good<s%> for that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he had not been <S%G1080>born.<s%>"

And while they were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> He <S%G2983>took<s%> [some] <S%G740>bread,<s%> and after a <S%G2127>blessing<s%> He <S%G2806>broke<s%> [it]; and <S%G1325>gave<s%> [it] to them, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take<s%> [it]; <S%G3778>this<s%> is My <S%G4983>body<s%>."
And when He had <S%G2983>taken<s%> a <S%G4221>cup,<s%> [and] <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> [it] to them; and they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drank<s%> from it.
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G7062>poured<s%> out for <S%G4183>many.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3765>again<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G7032>fruit<s%> of the <S%G288>vine<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G4095>drink<s%> it <S%G2537>new<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
And after <S%G5214>singing<s%> a <S%G5214>hymn,<s%> they <S%G1831>went<s%> out to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " You will <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'I will <S%G3960>strike<s%> <S%G3960>down<s%> the <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> shall be <S%G1287>scattered.<s%>'
"But <S%G3326>after<s%> I have been <S%G1453>raised,<s%> I will <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you to <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>"
But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to Him, "[Even] <S%G1487>though<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> I will not."

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that you <S%G4771>yourself<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4594>very<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> a <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crows<s%> <S%G1364>twice,<s%> shall <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times<s%> <S%G533>deny<s%> Me."

But [Peter] kept <S%G2980>saying<s%> <S%G7060>insistently,<s%> "[Even] <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G1163>have<s%> to <S%G4880>die<s%> with You, I will not <S%G533>deny<s%> You!" And they <S%G3956>all<s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>thing,<s%> <S%G2532>too.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to a <S%G5564>place<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane;<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2523>"Sit<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I have <S%G4336>prayed.<s%>"
And He <S%G3880>took<s%> with Him <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to be <S%G1568>very<s%> <S%G1568>distressed<s%> and <S%G85>troubled.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "My <S%G5590>soul<s%> is <S%G4036>deeply<s%> <S%G4036>grieved<s%> to the <S%G2193>point<s%> of <S%G2288>death;<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> and <S%G1127>keep<s%> <S%G1127>watch.<s%>"

And He <S%G4281>went<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G4281>beyond<s%> [them,] and <S%G4098>fell<s%> to the <S%G1093>ground,<s%> and [began] to <S%G4336>pray<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> it were <S%G1415>possible,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> might <S%G3928>pass<s%> Him by.

And He was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Abba! <S%G5>Father!<s%> <S%G3962>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G3956>possible<s%> for Thee; <S%G1415>remove<s%> <S%G3911>this<s%> <S%G3778>cup<s%> from Me; <S%G4221>yet<s%> not <S%G235>what<s%> I <S%G5101>will,<s%> but <S%G2309>what<s%> Thou wilt."

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> are you <S%G2518>asleep<s%>? <S%G2480>Could<s%> you not <S%G1127>keep<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>?

<S%G1127>"Keep<s%> watching and <S%G4336>praying,<s%> that you may not <S%G2064>come<s%> into <S%G3986>temptation;<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G4289>willing,<s%> but the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G772>weak.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3056>words.<s%>

And <S%G3825>again<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> for their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were very <S%G7102>heavy;<s%> and they did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> Him.

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Are you <S%G3062>still<s%> <S%G2518>sleeping<s%> and <S%G373>taking<s%> your <S%G373>rest<s%>? It is <S%G568>enough;<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> has <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is being <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G268>sinners.<s%>
<S%G1453>"Arise,<s%> let us be <S%G71>going;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the one who <S%G3860>betrays<s%> Me is at <S%G1448>hand!<s%>"

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> while He was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> up, <S%G3326>accompanied<s%> <S%G846><s%> by a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> with <S%G3162>swords<s%> and <S%G3586>clubs,<s%> from the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him had <S%G1325>given<s%> them a <S%G4953>signal,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3739>"Whomever<s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall <S%G5368>kiss,<s%> He is the one; <S%G2902>seize<s%> Him, and <S%G520>lead<s%> Him <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G806>under<s%> <S%G806>guard.<s%>"
And after <S%G2064>coming,<s%> he <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G4334>went<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi!<s%>" and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> Him.
And they <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on Him, and <S%G2902>seized<s%> Him.

But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3936>stood<s%> by <S%G4685>drew<s%> his <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and <S%G3817>struck<s%> the <S%G1401>slave<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G851>cut<s%> <S%G851>off<s%> his <S%G5621>ear.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Have you <S%G1831>come<s%> out with <S%G3162>swords<s%> and <S%G3586>clubs<s%> to <S%G4815>arrest<s%> Me, as <S%G1909>against<s%> a <S%G3027>robber<s%>?

<S%G2596>"Every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> I was with you in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> and you did not <S%G2902>seize<s%> Me; but [this has happened] that the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>"
And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> Him and <S%G5343>fled.<s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>man<s%> was <S%G4870>following<s%> Him, <S%G4016>wearing<s%> [nothing but] a <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G4616>sheet<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> [his] <S%G1131>naked<s%> [body;] and they <S%G2902>seized<s%> him.
But he <S%G2641>left<s%> the <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G4616>sheet<s%> <S%G2641>behind,<s%> and <S%G5343>escaped<s%> <S%G1131>naked.<s%>

And they <S%G520>led<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G520>away<s%> to the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4905>gathered<s%> <S%G4905>together.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> had <S%G190>followed<s%> Him at a <S%G3113>distance,<s%> <S%G2193>right<s%> into the <S%G833>courtyard<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest;<s%> and he was <S%G4775>sitting<s%> with the <S%G5257>officers,<s%> and <S%G2328>warming<s%> himself at the <S%G5457>fire.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>Council<s%> kept <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G2212>obtain<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G2289>put<s%> Him to <S%G2289>death;<s%> and they were not <S%G2147>finding<s%> any.
For <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G5576>giving<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>testimony<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him, and [yet] their <S%G3141>testimony<s%> was not <S%G2470>consistent.<s%>
And <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up and [began] to <S%G5576>give<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>testimony<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>
